name: Beanie vs. Alien
description:
Hi again!

This is Project 2 of Game Programming 2 class at Hunter College, Spring 2020. The prompt was to make a game with two levels. I made a shooting game where you shoot the alien to win the game!

Controls:

WASD - Move Beanie (the blue bean)

Use the mouse to aim and left-click to shoot the alien!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Things I would like to work on:

  • The sizing of the game. Please use full screen!
  • More visuals! And music! And sound effects!
  • The shots from the enemy are WEIRD!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Last Thoughts:

My second game! This was a lot harder and I spend a lot of time on this game. I enjoyed the process...somewhat. Like my first game, I would like to work on this more at a later point in time.
